title: Electromagnetism minimal positioning

scale_check.note: p–e interaction energy magnitudes at r=a0 (Bohr radius).

postulates.statement: Introduce a U(1) gauge field (Aμ, E, B) with sources ρ,J as the minimal EM dof.
Coulomb 1/r is fixed via Gauss law in the electrostatic limit.
Photons are transverse EM waves (two polarizations); energy flow is given by the Poynting vector.

Local Maxwell/QED is kept unchanged at this stage. α is treated as P-independent (κ=0), and κ≠0 is constrained by alpha_p_dependence_constraint.json. P-model affects photon paths via n(P) (coordinate-time description).

open_problems: Derive U(1) charge/gauge symmetry from P-model wave structure (phase/topology)
Couple EM stress-energy to P consistently (beyond phenomenology)
Unify photon propagation n(P) with Maxwell-in-background derivation (beyond geometric optics)
